name: Accident Recon Calculator Demo
description: DEMO VERSION (Only Minimum Speed, Grade, and Speed Conversion, and Imperial Units are enabled.) Full version is available.  Our Accident Reconstruction Calculator for Android is a Crash Reconstruction Calculator for Vehicle Crash, Accident Investigators, or Traffic Homicide Investigators on Android Mobile Devices. This is a simple Mobile Reconstruction Calculator in which Crash Investigators can compute quick calculations of Speed, Velocity, Vaults, Slides, Flips, Constant / Average, Momentum, and much more. Our package is organized by formula types and each calculation displays the formula used. Some crash formulas include:  Imperial or Metric Calculations Slide To Stop Combined Speed Critical Speed Curve Constant / Average Speed Speed Velocity Conversion Coefficient of Friction Adjustments Drag Factor Force (Drag Sled) Drag Factor using Speed (Skid Tests) Acceleration Factor from Stop Grade / Superelevation Constant / Average Time Acceleration Time from stop Time of Skid / Slide Airborne Fall, Vaults, and Flips Pedestrian Vaults / Flips / Slide Linear Momentum In Line Momentum Grade Detector Swerve To Avoid Propensity to Roll / Speed to Roll Customized Reports (Emailed To Your Inbox) Much more  More Screen Shots available at http://onlinepoliceapps.com/android-applications/accident-reconstruction-calculator/  Please download the Demo first on your device to make sure the app works on your device.
